site.notes: Former St. Louis County tuberculosis sanatorium (est. 1912), later converted to a nursing home. Closed to the public as of 2019 following fire code violations. No active official website. Included as a formerly-ticketed site useful for historical corpus analysis. Ownership changed hands several times; history includes tuberculosis treatment, ghost hunts, and administrative controversy. Wikipedia URL used as official_site_url placeholder since no official site exists.
